title: Give me a reading list of 20 articles up to 2021 about interpretability of natural language processing (nlp) models and more specifically about fine-grained interpretation and causation analysis
<|assistant|>
Here's a reading list of 20 articles up to 2021 about interpretability of natural language processing (NLP) models, focusing on fine-grained interpretation and causation analysis
Interpretability of NLP Models: A Survey
This survey paper provides an overview of interpretability methods for NLP models, with a focus on fine-grained analysis and causal reasoning
Interpretable NLP: A Survey of Methods and Challenges
This survey paper covers various aspects of interpretability in NLP, including fine-grained analysis and causal reasoning
Fine-Grained NLP: A Survey
This survey paper focuses on fine-grained NLP tasks, including causal reasoning and interpretability
Interpretable NLP Models for Sentiment Analysis
This paper presents an interpretable NLP model for sentiment analysis, with a focus on fine-grained analysis and causal reasoning
Causal Inference for NLP: A Survey
This survey paper covers various methods for causal inference in NLP, including fine-grained analysis and interpretability
Interpretable NLP Models for Named Entity Recognition
This paper presents an interpretable NLP model for named entity recognition, with a focus on fine-grained analysis and causal reasoning

This paper presents an interpretable NLP model for text classification, with a focus on fine-grained analysis and causal reasoning
